00024                 // Fixed size array
00025                 //=====================================
00026                 template <typename T>
00027                 class FixedArray
00028                 {
00029                 public:
00030                         // array of elements of type T
00031                         T *elements;    
00032 
00033                         // type definitions
00034                         typedef T              value_type;
00035                         typedef T*             iterator;
00036                         typedef const T*       const_iterator;
00037                         typedef T&             reference;
00038                         typedef const T&       const_reference;
00039 
00040                 public:
00041 
00043                         explicit FixedArray(u32 _size = 10)
00044                                 : m_Size(_size)
00045                         {
00046                                 elements = KGE_NEW_ARRAY(T,_size);
00047                         };
00048 
00050                         #if KGE_CPP11_COMPILER == 1
00051                                 FixedArray(std::initializer_list<T> seq)
00052                                 {
00053                                         elements = KGE_NEW_ARRAY(T,seq.size());
00054                                         m_Size = seq.size();
00055                                         int i = 0;
00056                                         for (auto it = seq.begin() ; it != seq.end() ; it++,i++)
00057                                         {
00058                                                 elements[i] = (*it);
00059                                         }
00060                                 };
00061                         #endif // KGE_COMPILER_CPP11
00062 
00064                         FixedArray(const FixedArray<T>& ar)
00065                         {
00066                                 m_Size = ar.size()
00067                                 memcpy(elements,ar.elements,sizeof(T) * ar.size());
00068                         };
00069 
00071                         ~FixedArray()
00072                         {
00073                                 KGE_DELETE_ARRAY(elements);
00074                         };
00075 
00077                         reference front() 
00078                         { 
00079                                 return elements[0]; 
00080                         };
00081         
00082                         const_reference front() const 
00083                         {
00084                                 return elements[0];
00085                         };
00086         
00088                         reference back() 
00089                         { 
00090                                 return elements[(m_Size-1)]; 
00091                         }
00092         
00093                         const_reference back() const 
00094                         { 
00095                                 return elements[(m_Size-1)]; 
00096                         }
00097 
00099                         u32 size() { return m_Size;};
00100 
00102                         bool empty() { return !(bool)m_Size;};
00103 
00105                         void swap (FixedArray<T>& y)
00106                         {
00107                                 if ( m_Size != y.size())
00108                                         return;
00109 
00110                                 for (u32 i = 0; i < m_Size; ++i)
00111                                 {
00112                                         T temp = y.elements[i];
00113                                         y.elements[i] = elements[i];
00114                                         elements[i] = temp;
00115                                 }
00116                         };
00117 
00118                         // direct access to data (read-only)
00119                         const T* data() const { return elements; }
00120                         T* data() { return elements;};
00121 
00122                         // use array as C array (direct read/write access to data)
00123                         T* c_array() { return elements;};
00124 
00126                         iterator begin() { return elements; };
00127                         const_iterator begin() const { return elements; };
00128                         iterator end() { return  elements + m_Size ; };
00129                         const_iterator end() const { return elements + m_Size; };
00130 
00132                         inline reference operator[](u32 _index) 
00133                         { 
00134                                 assert(_index < m_Size);
00135                                 return elements[_index];
00136                         }
00137 
00139                         inline const_reference operator[](u32 _index) const 
00140                         {     
00141                                 assert(_index <m_Size);
00142                                 return elements[_index]; 
00143                         }
00144 
00145                         // at() with range check
00146                         reference at(u32 _index)
00147                         {
00148                                 assert(_index <m_Size);
00149                                 return elements[_index]; 
00150                         }
00151                         const_reference at(u32  _index) const           
00152                         { 
00153                                 assert(_index <m_Size);
00154                                 return elements[_index];
00155                         }
00156     
00158                         void assign (const T& _value) { fill ( _value ); }    // A synonym for fill
00159       
00161                         void fill   (const T& _value)
00162                         {
00163                     std::fill_n(begin(),size(),_value);
00164                         }
00165 
00166                 private:
00167                         u32 m_Size; // size of array
00168                 }; // Array

00172                 //=====================================
00173                 template <typename T,u32 block_size = KGE_DEFAULT_ARRAY_BLOCK_SIZE>
00174                 class DynamicArray
00175                 {
00176                 public:
00177                         // array of elements of type T
00178                         T *elements;    
00179 
00180                         // type definitions
00181                         typedef T              value_type;
00182                         typedef T*             iterator;
00183                         typedef const T*       const_iterator;
00184                         typedef T&             reference;
00185                         typedef const T&       const_reference;
00186 
00187                 public:
00189                         explicit DynamicArray()
00190                                 : m_Size(0),m_MaxSize(0),elements(NULL)
00191                         {}
00192 
00194                         DynamicArray(const DynamicArray<T>& ar)
00195                         {
00196                                 m_Size = ar.size();
00197                                 memcpy(elements,ar.elements,sizeof(T) * ar.size());
00198                         }
00199 
00200 
00202                         #if KGE_CPP11_COMPILER == 1
00203                         DynamicArray(std::initializer_list<T> seq)
00204                         {
00205                                 elements = KGE_NEW_ARRAY(T,seq.size());
00206                                 m_Size = seq.size();
00207                                 int i = 0;
00208                                 for (auto it = seq.begin() ; it != seq.end() ; it++,i++)
00209                                 {
00210                                         push_back((*it));
00211                                 }
00212                         }
00213                         #endif // KGE_COMPILER_CPP11
00214 
00216                         ~DynamicArray()
00217                         {
00218                                 KGE_DELETE_ARRAY(elements);
00219                         }
00220 
00221                         void clear()
00222                         {
00223                                 m_Size = 0;
00224                                 KGE_DELETE_ARRAY(elements);
00225                         }
00226 
00228                         reference front() 
00229                         { 
00230                                 return elements[0]; 
00231                         }
00232

00235                         {

00238

00241                         { 
00242                                 return elements[(m_Size-1)]; 
00243                         }
00244

00247                         { 
00248                                 return elements[(m_Size-1)]; 
00249                         }

00253 
00255                         inline u32 max_size(void) const {return m_MaxSize;};
00256 
00258                         bool empty(void) const { return !(bool)m_Size; }

00262                         {
00264                         }
00265

00267                         const T* data() const { return elements; }

00276                         iterator end() { return  elements + m_Size ; };

00281                         { 
00282                                 assert(index < m_Size);
00283                                 return elements[index];
00284                         }

00289                                 assert(index <m_Size);

00306                         void assign (const T& _value) { fill ( _value ); }    // A synonym for fill
00307 
00309                         void fill(const T& _value)
00310                         {
00311                                 std::fill_n(begin(),size(),_value);
00312                         }
00313 
00315                         void push_back(const_reference _item)
00316                         {
00317                                 if(m_Size == m_MaxSize) 
00318                                 {
00319                                         expand();
00320                                 }
00321                                 elements[m_Size] = _item;
00322                                 m_Size++;                               
00323 
00324                         }
00325 
00327                         void erase(iterator _where)
00328                         {
00329                                 memcpy(_where,(_where +1),(end() - (_where+1)) * sizeof(T) );
00330                                 m_Size--;
00331                                 if ((m_MaxSize - m_Size) > block_size)
00332                                         contract();
00333                         }
00334 
00336                         void erase(u32 _index)
00337                         {
00338                                 if (_index > m_Size)
00339                                         return;
00340                                 memcpy(elements + _index,elements+_index+1,(m_Size - _index - 1) * sizeof(T));
00341                                 m_Size--;
00342                                 if ((m_MaxSize - m_Size) > block_size)
00343                                         contract();
00344                         }
00345                 private:
00346                         u32 m_MaxSize;  
00347                         u32 m_Size;             
00348 
00350                         inline void expand(void)
00351                         {
00352                                 m_MaxSize += block_size;
00353                                 T* temp_buf = elements;
00354                                 elements = KGE_NEW_ARRAY(T,m_MaxSize);
00355                                 memcpy(elements,temp_buf,m_Size * sizeof(T));
00356                                 KGE_DELETE_ARRAY(temp_buf);
00357                         }
00358 
00360                         inline void contract(void)
00361                         {
00362                                 m_MaxSize -= block_size;
00363                                 T* temp_buf = elements;
00364                                 elements = KGE_NEW_ARRAY(T,m_MaxSize);
00365                                 memcpy(elements,temp_buf,m_Size * sizeof(T));
00366                                 KGE_DELETE_ARRAY(temp_buf);
00367                         }
00368                 }; // DynamicArray
00369         } // core
